text: The staff at David Phee are friendly and knowledgeable to deal with, they are happy to help you get a great result on your project. The service and products like pipe joints, pipe couplings, stainless steel repair clamps is top notch and I highly recommend using them from your next project needs.
Prompt replies and quick to deliver. Marcus helps to coordinate my project requirements, from the specs to the delivery time. Will definitely come back again.
Professional and highly responsive to customer! Definitely recommended for those who want to look for specialised, top quality, and flexible pipe joints and pipe repair üëçüèª
Marcus has shown professionalism and good knowledge in the field regarding every enquiry and needs that I had. Recommended!
